title: Forensic History: Crimes, Frauds, and Scandals - Dr. Elizabeth A
description:

Synopsis: Modern history is filled with terrible crimes, baffling hoaxes, and seedy scandals. The infamous Jack the Ripper slayings. The alleged survival of Anastasia Romanov, the youngest daughter of the murdered Tsar. Seven-time Tour de France winner Lance Armstrongâ€™s public fall from grace. The Chicago Tylenol poisonings and the copycat crimes that followed.

Content:

01.The Infamous Jack the Ripper
02.Analyzing the Black Dahlia Murder
03.Dissecting Hollywood Deaths

05.Lizzie Borden and the Menendez Brothers
06.The Tylenol Murders

08.Frauds and Forgeries
09.Blood Doping and Other Sports Scandals
10.Bad Boys of U.S. Politics
11.Criminals of the Wild, Wild West

19.Forensics of Genocide

21.The Spies Have It
